In order to correctly organize files in a folder do the following:
1. Right click when inside the folder
2. Sort by: Date modified
3. Right click again
4. Sort by: Ascending

In order to get the most out of the cover art do the following: 
1. Right click inside the folder 
2. View: Extra Large Icons
